headline: PNC Financial Services : Investments Hires Brendan Krebs to Lead, Expand Wealth Advisor Team
summary: PITTSBURGH, Nov. 25, 2024 - PNC Bank announced today it has hired Brendan Krebs as managing director to lead the Wealth Advisor team at PNC Investments . Krebs will report to Richard Guerrini,...
